title: Name variables
text: Let n $$=$$ the first number and m $$=$$ the second number.

title: Equations
text: We know the sum of the two numbers is -27, and that the difference is -59. Using this, we can create two equations. One is $$n+m=-17$$, and the other $$n-m=-59$$

title: Solve
text: Now, solve for n or m, and plug it into the equation to find the other variable.
